mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENTERPRISE_SUP_MAPPING ( ID, COMPANY_ID, SUP_INFO_ID ) VALUES ( COMPANY_MAPPING_INDEX.Nextval, #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supInfoId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select count(1) from T_ENTERPRISE_SUP_MAPPING t, T_SUP_INFO s,t_company_info k where t.sup_info_id = s.sup_id and t.company_id = k.company_code and k.IF_DELETE = '1' and s.if_valid = '1' and (t.company_id in (select k.company_code from t_company_info k start with k.company_code = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} connect by prior k.company_code = k.parent_company_id))
AND S.SUP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{supName} || '%'
AND S.CONTACT_PERSON LIKE '%' || #{contactPerson} || '%'
AND S.CONTACT_NUM LIKE '%' || #{contactNum} || '%'
AND T.ID = #{id}

select count(1) from t_sup_info s where s.if_valid = '1' and s.sup_id not in (select t.sup_info_id from T_ENTERPRISE_SUP_MAPPING t WHERE t.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
AND s.sup_name LIKE '%' || #{searchSupName} || '%'
